mapper.select: select `id`,`student_name`,`student_sex`,ideentity_type,`nation`,`birthday`,`identity_card`,`school`,`grade`,`student_class`,`phone`,`address`,`height`,`weight`,`add_time`,`status`,q_r_code,last_check_time,xue_bu,activity_id,sys_id,school_id from t_student_new where id = #{value}

select `id`,`student_name`,`student_sex`,ideentity_type,`nation`,`birthday`,`identity_card`,`school`,`grade`,`student_class`,`phone`,`address`,`height`,`weight`,`add_time`,`status`,q_r_code,last_check_time,xue_bu,activity_id,sys_id,school_id from t_student_new GROUP BY school
select DISTINCT student_name from t_student_new where check_type = 'SHI_FANXIAO' and student_name like concat('%', #{studentName},'%') limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select DISTINCT `activity_id` from t_student_new where check_type = 'SHI_FANXIAO'
select DISTINCT `school`,`school_id` from t_student_new where check_type = 'SHI_FANXIAO' and activity_id = #{activityId}

SELECT DISTINCT school,school_id FROM t_student_new
and activity_id = #{activityId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_student_new ( `student_name`, `student_sex`, `nation`, `birthday`, `identity_card`, `school`, `grade`, `student_class`, `phone`, `address`, `height`, `weight`, `add_time`, `status`, q_r_code, last_check_time, model_type, ideentity_type, school_code, xue_bu, check_type, check_local, student_number, name_jianpin, activity_id, sys_id, school_id, `dengxiaoqiujingr`, `dengxiaoqiujingl`, naked_farvision_od, naked_farvision_os ) values ( #{studentName}, #{studentSex}, #{nation}, #{birthday}, #{identityCard}, #{school}, #{grade}, #{studentClass}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{addTime}, #{status}, #{QRCode}, #{lastCheckTime}, #{modelType}, #{ideentityType}, #{schoolCode}, #{xueBu}, #{checkType}, #{checkLocal}, #{studentNumber}, #{nameJianpin}, #{activityId}, #{sysId}, #{schoolId}, #{dengxiaoqiujingr}, #{dengxiaoqiujingl}, #{nakedFarvisionOd}, #{nakedFarvisionOs} )

insert into t_student_new ( `student_name`, `student_sex`, `nation`, `birthday`, `identity_card`, `school`, `grade`, `student_class`, `phone`, `address`, `height`, `weight`, `add_time`, `status`, q_r_code, last_check_time, model_type, ideentity_type, school_code, xue_bu, check_type, check_local, student_number, name_jianpin, activity_id, sys_id, school_id ) VALUES
( #{user.studentName}, #{user.studentSex}, #{user.nation}, #{user.birthday}, #{user.identityCard}, #{user.school}, #{user.grade}, #{user.studentClass}, #{user.phone}, #{user.address}, #{user.height}, #{user.weight}, #{user.addTime}, #{user.status}, #{user.QRCode}, #{user.lastCheckTime}, #{user.modelType}, #{user.ideentityType}, #{user.schoolCode}, #{user.xueBu}, #{user.checkType}, #{user.checkLocal}, #{user.studentNumber}, #{user.nameJianpin}, #{user.activityId}, #{user.sysId}, #{user.schoolId} )
mapper.delete:
delete from t_student_new where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(answer_id) from t_answer_result
and identity_card = #{identityCard}

SELECT t_eyesight_id, student_id, checkor_id, life_farvision_od, life_farvision_os, ifnull(naked_farvision_od,'') nakedFarvisionOd, ifnull(naked_farvision_os,'') nakedFarvisionOs, ifnull(correction_farvision_od,'') correctionFarvisionOd, ifnull(correction_farvision_os,'') correctionFarvisionOs, ifnull(life_nearvision_od,'') lifeNearvisionOd, ifnull(life_nearvision_os,'') lifeNearvisionOs, ifnull(naked_nearvision_od,'') nakedNearvisionOd, ifnull(naked_nearvision_os,'') nakedNearvisionOs, check_date FROM t_result_eyesight_new WHERE student_id = #{studentId} order by check_date desc limit 1

SELECT ifnull(diopter_s, '') diopterS, ifnull(diopter_c, '') diopterC, ifnull(diopter_a, '') diopterA, ifnull(dengxiaoqiujing,'') dengxiaoqiujing FROM t_result_diopter_new d, ( SELECT `t_optometry_id`, `student_id` FROM t_result_optometry_new WHERE student_id = #{studentId} order by check_date desc limit 1 ) o WHERE d.t_optometry_id = o.t_optometry_id AND d.ifRL = #{ifRL} AND type="AVG" ORDER BY d.t_diopter_id DESC
select ifnull(eye_pressure_od,'') eyePressureOd,ifnull(eye_pressure_os,'') eyePressureOs from t_result_eyepressure_new where student_id=#{studentId} order by check_date desc limit 1

select ifnull(second_check_od,'') secondCheckOd,ifnull(second_check_os,'') secondCheckOs,ifnull(first_check_od,'') firstCheckOd,ifnull(first_check_os,'') firstCheckOs from t_result_eyeaxis_new where student_id=#{studentId} order by check_date desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_result_eyesight_new ( `student_id`, `checkor_id`, `life_farvision_od`, `life_farvision_os`, `naked_farvision_od`, `naked_farvision_os`, `correction_farvision_od`, `correction_farvision_os`, `life_nearvision_od`, `life_nearvision_os`, `naked_nearvision_od`, `naked_nearvision_os`, `check_date`, `delete_flag`, identity_card, glassvision_od, glassvision_os ) values ( #{studentId}, #{checkorId}, #{lifeFarvisionOd}, #{lifeFarvisionOs}, #{nakedFarvisionOd}, #{nakedFarvisionOs}, #{correctionFarvisionOd}, #{correctionFarvisionOs}, #{lifeNearvisionOd}, #{lifeNearvisionOs}, #{nakedNearvisionOd}, #{nakedNearvisionOs}, #{checkDate}, #{deleteFlag}, #{identityCard}, #{glassvisionOd}, #{glassvisionOs} )

insert into t_result_diopter_new ( `t_optometry_id`, `diopter_s`, `diopter_c`, `diopter_a`, `believe`, `num`, `type`, `ifRL`, first_second, identity_card, check_date ) values ( #{tOptometryId}, #{diopterS}, #{diopterC}, #{diopterA}, #{believe}, #{num}, #{type}, #{ifrl}, #{firstSecond}, #{identityCard}, #{checkDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(corneal_mm, '') cornealMm, ifnull(corneal_d, '') cornealD, ifnull(corneal_deg, '') cornealDeg FROM t_result_corneal_new d, ( SELECT `t_optometry_id`, `student_id` FROM t_result_optometry_new WHERE student_id = #{studentId} order by check_date desc limit 1 ) o WHERE d.t_optometry_id = o.t_optometry_id AND d.ifRL = #{ifrl} AND d.type=#{type} ORDER BY d.t_corneal_id DESC

SELECT ifnull(naked_farvision_od,0.0) nakedFarvisionOd, ifnull(naked_farvision_os,0.0) nakedFarvisionOs, identity_card, check_date
FROM t_result_eyesight_new group by identity_card having check_date=max(check_date) limit #{i},#{j}

select ifnull(dengxiaoqiujing,0.0) dengxiaoqiujing,identity_card,check_date from t_result_diopter_new where ifRL=#{ifRL} AND type='AVG' GROUP BY identity_card having check_date=max(check_date) limit #{i},#{j}
SELECT ifnull(identity_card, 0) identityCard, ifnull(birthday,now()) birthday FROM t_student_new LIMIT #{i},#{j}

select id, school,student_name,grade ,xue_bu from t_student_new where school = #{school} and activity_id = #{activityId} group by grade ORDER BY field(grade,'幼儿园','一年级','二年级','三年级','四年级','五年级','六年级','初一','初二','初三','初四','高一','高二','高三')

select id, school,student_name,grade ,xue_bu from t_student_new where school = #{school} group by grade ORDER BY field(grade,'幼儿园','一年级','二年级','三年级','四年级','五年级','六年级','初一','初二','初三','初四','高一','高二','高三')

select id ,student_class,school,student_name from t_student_new where school = #{school} and activity_id = #{activityId} and grade = #{grade} GROUP BY student_class ORDER BY CAST(student_class AS UNSIGNED) asc

select ifnull(dengxiaoqiujingr,-10) dengxiaoqiujingr, ifnull(dengxiaoqiujingl,-10) dengxiaoqiujingl,birthday, ifnull(naked_farvision_od,"r") nakedFarvisionOd, ifnull(naked_farvision_os,"r") nakedFarvisionOs
from t_student_new where last_check_time is not null limit #{i},#{j}
SELECT COUNT(*) from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId}
select COUNT(*) from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and last_check_time is not null
select school, school_id from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} GROUP BY school_id
select COUNT(*) from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school_id = #{schoolId}
select COUNT(*) from t_student_new where activity_id = #{activityId} and school_id = #{schoolId} and last_check_time is not null
